$usersLabel

    $escapetool.xml($userReference.name) ## Display the wiki only for local users. #if ($userReference.wikiReference.name != $xcontext.getMainWikiName()) $escapetool.xml($userReference.wikiReference.name) #end

#end #end #* * Display a list of groups * ----- * * Display a list of groups with the avatar, the name and the gid. *# #macro(displayGroups $groups $mode) #set($groupsLabel = "") #if($mode == "edit") #set($groupsLabel = $services.localization.render("eesc.ProjectCreate.share.groupsAllowedToEdit")) #else #set($groupsLabel = $services.localization.render("eesc.ProjectCreate.share.groupsAllowedToView")) #end #if ($groups.size() > 0)
$groupsLabel

    $escapetool.xml($groupName)
    $escapetool.xml($groupReference.name) ## Display the wiki only for local groups. #if ($groupReference.wikiReference.name != $xcontext.getMainWikiName()) $escapetool.xml($groupReference.wikiReference.name) #end
    • #end
#end #end #* * Share form macro * ----- * * This macro displays the material to share a project following a step by step questionaire * * Author: Fabio MANCINELLI * Jean SIMARD Mohamed Boussaa *# #macro(htmlshareproject $projectname $scope $eusers $egroups $vusers $vgroups, $mode) #set($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use("EESCCode.ShareMacro")) #set($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use("EESCCode.ShareMacro")) #userPicker_import() #set($projectref = $services.model.createDocumentReference(${xcontext.mainWikiName}, 'Projects', $projectname)) #set($project = $xwiki.getDocument($projectref)) #set($shareobj = $project.getObject('EESCCode.CollaborativeProjectClass')) #set($rightobjs = $project.getObjects('XWiki.XWikiRights')) #set($projectscope = $shareobj.getProperty('scope').value) #set($projectEditUsers = "") #set($projectEditGroups = "") #set($projectViewUsers = "") #set($projectViewGroups = "") #set($qlmsg= ${services.localization.render('eesc.ProjectShare.q1msg')}) #set($q2msg = ${services.localization.render('eesc.ProjectShare.q2msg')}) #if($projectscope.startsWith('some') || $projectscope.endsWith('some')) #foreach($rightobj in $rightobjs) #set($user = $rightobj.getProperty('users').value) #set($group = $rightobj.getProperty('groups').value) #set($levels = $rightobj.getProperty('levels').value) #if($user && !$user.equals('')) #if(!$user.equals($project.creator) && $levels && !$levels.equals('')) #if($levels.equals('view,edit') || $levels.equals('edit,view')) #set($projectEditUsers = "${projectEditUsers}${user},") #else #set($projectViewUsers = "${projectViewUsers}${user},") #end #end #elseif($group && !$group.equals('') && $levels && !$levels.equals('')) #if($levels.equals('view,edit') || $levels.equals('edit,view')) #set($projectEditGroups = "${projectEditGroups}${group},") #else #set($projectViewGroups = "${projectViewGroups}${group},") #end #end #end #end ## If variables have been given as arguments ($scope, $eusers, $egroups, $vusers and $vgroups), then replace the previous values #if($scope) #set($projectscope = $scope) #end ## Edit users and groups #if($eusers && !$eusers.equals('')) #set($projectEditUsers = '') #set($sep = '') #foreach($user in $eusers) #set($projectEditUsers = "${projectEditUsers}${sep}${user}") #set($sep = ',') #end #end #if($egroups && !$egroups.equals('')) #set($projectEditGroups = '') #set($sep = '') #foreach($group in $egroups) #set($projectEditGroups = "${projectEditGroups}${sep}${group}") #set($sep = ',') #end #end ## view users and groups #if($vusers && !$vusers.equals('')) #set($projectViewUsers = '') #set($sep = '') #foreach($user in $vusers) #set($projectViewUsers = "${projectViewUsers}${sep}${user}") #set($sep = ',') #end #end #if($vgroups && !$vgroups.equals('')) #set($projectViewGroups = '') #set($sep = '') #foreach($group in $vgroups) #set($projectViewGroups = "${projectViewGroups}${sep}${group}") #set($sep = ',') #end #end
#if($mode == 'view') #set($sharekey = "eesc.ProjectCreate.share.$projectscope") ${services.localization.render($sharekey)} #if($projectscope.startsWith('some')) #displayUsers($eusers "edit") #displayGroups($egroups "edit") #end #if($projectscope.endsWith('some')) #displayUsers($vusers "view") #displayGroups($vgroups "view") #end #else
${services.localization.render('eesc.ProjectCreate.hint.users')}
${services.localization.render('eesc.ProjectCreate.hint.groups')}
${services.localization.render('eesc.ProjectCreate.hint.users')}
${services.localization.render('eesc.ProjectCreate.hint.groups')}
#end
#end {{/velocity}}
